Class Camera

  • java.lang.Object
    • Camera

  • public class Camera
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    David McAllister, Eric Cheng

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Camera(int windowWidth, int windowHeight, Manager m)
      Constructs a new camera that sets a level of zoom based on the window width and height
